content.html: This is such a bad take. I don’t even know what you mean by business cycle, nor has that terminology ever come up in my decade in tech. I don’t think anyone that uses arbitrary requirements to define titles should be deciding who should be staff engineers.
content.value:
This is such a bad take. I don’t even know what you mean by business cycle, nor has that terminology ever come up in my decade in tech.

I don’t think anyone that uses arbitrary requirements to define titles should be deciding who should be staff engineers.
